name: Grid Trading BTC/USDT
description: Grid trading strategy that places multiple buy and sell orders at different price levels to profit from market volatility. Works best in ranging markets.
author: Emiglio

capital.comment: Multiple small positions spread across grid levels

grid_config.comment: 10 levels with 1.5% spacing between each level

risk_management.comment: Conservative stop loss with smaller take profit for grid strategy

indicators.name: atr
indicators.comment: Average True Range for volatility measurement

rules.description: Open grid level available for new order

entry_conditions.comment: Grid orders placed when price is ranging and volatility is adequate

rules.description: Take profit at next grid level
Price breaks below range (exit all positions)
Price breaks above range (exit all positions)

exit_conditions.comment: Exit at grid levels or when market breaks out of range

backtest_config.comment: Test on 4 months of data to evaluate performance in different market conditions

notes: Grid trading profits from volatility in ranging markets
Best performance when market oscillates without strong trend
Requires active management and position monitoring
Consider wider grid spacing in highly volatile markets
May underperform in strong trending markets
